command.cooldown: %1$s *Oi oi! Slow down!!! This command is on cooldown for **%2$s**.*

imageboard_requester.image_is_nsfw: **Sorry, this image is only available for NSFW channels.**

avatar.user_not_found: *Err... I can't find that person. Try doing it again, I might've missed them*

help.slash_help: *Sa ngayon, hindi pa suportado ang slash commands. Gamitin mo na lamang ang* `%1$shelp`*.*

user_info.user_not_found: *Err... I can't find that person. Try doing it again, I might've missed them*

dice.unable_to_roll: *Sorry, I can't roll that for you*

ban.no_mentioned_member: %1$s **You have to mention a user to ban.**
ban.multiple_mentions: %1$s **Hold on! You can only ban member one at a time.**
ban.unable_to_ban: %1$s **Sorry, but you can't ban that person.**
ban.no_permission:
%1$s **You don't have the permission to do that.
Required: BAN_MEMBERS permission**

kick.no_mentioned_member: %1$s **You have to mention a user to kick.**
kick.multiple_mentions: %1$s **Hold on! You can only kick members one at a time.**
kick.unable_to_kick: %1$s **Sorry, but you can't kick that person.**
kick.no_permission:
%1$s **You don't have the permission to do that.
Required: KICK_MEMBERS permission**

guild_prefix.failed: %1$s **You can't set a prefix to nothing.**
guild_prefix.no_permission:
%1$s **Sorry, but you don't have the permission to do that.
Required: ADMINISTRATOR permission**

unban.no_id_provided: %1$s **You have to specify the ID of the user to unban.**
unban.no_permission:
%1$s **Sorry, but you don't have the permission to do that.
Required: BAN_MEMBERS permission**
unban.invalid_id: %1$s **That is not a valid user ID.**
unban.user_not_found: $1$s **That user isn't blacklisted from your server, maybe they does not exist at all.**

daily.daily_streak_increment: *Welcome back! You got another Streak! **Daily Streak: %d***
daily.daily_streak_reset: *You've been away for more than a day... **Streak was reset to %d**'*
daily.not_qualified: *It seems that you're still an amateur. You can't claim a daily unless you gain an experience as the rewards depends on your level.*
daily.not_registered: *Oops! You're not allowed to claim a daily yet. Come again later, but first, let me register you to the central guild.*
daily.user_not_found: **That user doesn't seem to exist, so you took the daily instead.**

expedition.dialogue: **You went into an expedition to fulfill a commission...**

hunt.attack: **Nilusob mo ang halimaw nang may katapangan!**
hunt.run: **Ikaw'y tumakas nang nalaman na higit na malakas ang halimaw sa iyo.**

embed_lost.title: Ikaw'y Natalo!
embed_lost.description: Nagtagumpay ang kalaban, at wala kang napanalunan.

insight.nothing_to_predict: *Mabuting umuwi ka na lang kung walang kahilingan*
insight.cannot_predict: *Paumanhin, ngunit hindi kayang hulaan ng Orakulo iyan.*

loot.dialogue: **You went into an abandoned dungeon and got some loots**
loot.no_item: **Sadly, there wasn't any item of value in there.**

profile.nothing_to_set: *W-what are you even trying to set?*
profile.set_status_failed: **You didn't specify what to write in your status.**
profile.set_birthday_failed: **You didn't specify what to write in your birthday.**
profile.cannot_set: *Erm... I can't set that for you.*
profile.player_not_found: *Err... I can't find that person. Try doing it again, I might've missed them*

rep.user_not_found: **You can't give this person a reputation right now.**

transfer.incomplete_args: **You have to specify the amount you're trying to send to whom.**

preference.no_action: **You didn't provide an action to do.**

language_preference.improper_format: **%1$s is not a proper country code!**
language_preference.invalid_language: **%1$s is not a valid language, available languages are: %2$s**

seed_of_life.name: Seed of Life
seed_of_life.desc: An unusual seed. Raises one's VIT by 3.

seed_of_wisdom.name: Seed of Wisdom
seed_of_wisdom.desc: An unusual seed. Raises one's WIS by 3.

elixir_of_life.name: Elixir of Life
elixir_of_life.desc: An elixir brewed by the ancients. Raises one's HP by 100.

elixir_of_mana.name: Elixir of Mana
elixir_of_mana.desc: An elixir brewed by the highest of mages. Raises one's MP by 80.
